bwwExcerpt: "Back to the Future," opening tonight on Broadway, is a nearly scene-by-scene re-creation of the 1985 movie on which it's based. This is in some ways a lost opportunity to reimagine a story that's as tied to a specific era as the sports car it showcases, the DeLorean, which stopped production in 1983.
